## readonly() function

Converts a mutable [Ref](./reactive.ref.md) to a [ReadonlyRef](./reactive.readonlyref.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function readonly<T>(ref: Ref<T>): ReadonlyRef<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | [Ref](./reactive.ref.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A mutable tracked reference |

<b>Returns:</b>
